mil5.5.5:1.2_0: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti.
mil5.5.5:1.4_0: ‘lomasakassapo nāma isi samāno anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajī’ti.
mil5.5.5:1.6_0: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti,
mil5.5.5:1.6_1: tena hi ‘lomasakassapena isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitan’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.5.5:1.7_0: Yadi ‘lomasakassapena isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitaṁ’,
mil5.5.5:1.7_1: tena hi ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.5.5:1.8_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.5:2.2_0: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti,
mil5.5.5:2.2_1: ‘lomasakassapena isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitaṁ’,
mil5.5.5:2.2_2: tañca pana rāgavasena visaññinā, no sacetanenā”ti.
mil5.5.5:3.4_0: Ime kho, bhante nāgasena, aṭṭha puggalā pāṇaṁ hananti.
mil5.5.5:3.6_2: bodhisatto pakatibhāvena onameyya mahāyaññaṁ yajituṁ, na yimaṁ gāthaṁ bhaṇeyya—
mil5.5.5:5.1_1: bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī ahosi khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto ākulākulo turitaturito tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena mahatimahāpasughātagalaruhirasañcayaṁ vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yaji.
mil5.5.5:6.1_1: ummattako khittacitto jalitampi jātavedaṁ akkamati, kupitampi āsīvisaṁ gaṇhāti, mattampi hatthiṁ upeti,
mil5.5.5:6.1_3: candanikampi oḷigallampi omaddati, kaṇṭakādhānampi abhiruhati, papātepi patati, asucimpi bhakkheti, naggopi rathiyā carati,
mil5.5.5:6.2_1: bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī ahosi khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto ākulākulo turitaturito,
mil5.5.5:6.2_2: tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena mahatimahāpasughātagalaruhirasañcayaṁ vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yaji.
mil5.5.5:7.1_1: kataṁ pāpaṁ diṭṭhadhammepi na mahāsāvajjaṁ hoti,
mil5.5.5:7.3_2: taṁ mayaṁ pothāpetvā nīharāpema, esova tassa daṇḍo”ti.
mil5.5.5:7.4_2: tasmā ummattakassa katepi na doso bhavati satekiccho.
mil5.5.5:7.5_1: lomasakassapo isi saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī ahosi khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto visaṭapayāto ākulākulo turitaturito,
mil5.5.5:7.5_2: tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena mahatimahāpasughātagalaruhirasañcayaṁ vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yaji.
mil5.5.5:7.6_0: Yadā ca pana pakaticitto ahosi paṭiladdhassati,
mil5.5.5:7.6_1: tadā punadeva pabbajitvā pañcābhiññāyo nibbattetvā brahmalokūpago ahosī”ti.
